content.text:
# Golden Goblet Award for Best Animated Short Film

The Golden Goblet Award for Best Animated Short Film () is a highest prize awarded to short films in the animation category of short film competition at the Shanghai International Film Festival since 2017.
Award winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Film !! Country
|-
| 2017 || Late Season || Daniela Leitner
|-
| 2018 || Tweet- Tweet || Zhanna Bekmambetova
|-
| 2019 || La Noria || Carlos Baena
|}
